record.name: SeriesLabels
record.description: The series label record defines the type of label associated with the data format record.
record.author: Glen Stampoultzis (glens at apache.org)

bit.name: show actual
bit.description: show actual value of the data point

bit.name: show percent
bit.description: show value as percentage of total (pie charts only)

bit.name: label as percentage
bit.description: show category label/value as percentage (pie charts only)
